summary: An application for managing appointments and time with alarm functionality
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Clean calendar icon illustration with minimal design in sage green on cream background (calendar-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Clock/alarm icon illustration with modern styling in muted teal (alarm-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a calendar view interface showing appointments by date with visual indicators for upcoming appointments
Build an appointment creation and editing form with inputs for title, description, date picker, time picker, duration selector, and alarm settings
Display a list view of all appointments sorted chronologically with options to filter by date range or search by title
Implement alarm functionality that checks for upcoming appointments and displays notifications when alarm time is reached
Create a dashboard view showing today's appointments, upcoming appointments in the next 7 days, and statistics (total appointments, upcoming count)

Apply a cohesive visual design with a professional, organized aesthetic using warm neutrals (beige, cream, soft gray) as the base palette with sage green or muted teal accents, clean sans-serif typography, card-based layouts with subtle shadows, and calendar-inspired visual elements

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a data model for appointments with fields: title, description, date, time, duration, and alarm settings
Implement CRUD operations for appointments: create new appointment, retrieve all appointments, retrieve single appointment by ID, update existing appointment, and delete appointment
